title: Login page not loading correctly
description: Users reporting that the login page fails to load properly on mobile devices

title: Database connection timeout
description: Production database experiencing intermittent connection timeouts during peak hours

title: Update user profile page UI
description: Redesign user profile page to match new design system standards

title: Email notifications not sending
description: Users not receiving password reset and verification emails

title: Mobile app crash on iOS 17
description: App crashes immediately after launch on devices running iOS 17.2

title: Add dark mode support
description: Implement dark theme throughout the application

title: Payment processing failed for international cards
description: International credit card transactions failing with error code 502

title: Slow dashboard loading times
description: User dashboard taking more than 8 seconds to load complete data

title: Broken image links in blog posts
description: Several blog posts showing broken image links after CDN migration

title: API rate limiting too restrictive
description: Customers reporting API rate limits are too low for their use cases

title: Password strength meter not working
description: Password strength indicator always shows 'weak' regardless of input

title: Missing translation strings
description: Several pages showing missing translation keys in French and Spanish locales

title: Search functionality returning incorrect results
description: Search feature returning unrelated results for specific queries

title: User avatar upload failing for large files
description: Avatar upload fails silently for images larger than 2MB

title: Browser compatibility issues with Safari
description: Layout breaks and JavaScript errors in Safari 16+

title: Two-factor authentication not working
description: 2FA codes not being accepted even when entered correctly

title: Notification preferences not saving
description: User notification settings revert to default after page refresh

title: Broken social media sharing links
description: Facebook and Twitter sharing buttons not generating proper previews

title: Order confirmation emails missing attachments
description: PDF invoices not attached to order confirmation emails

title: Performance optimization for large datasets
description: Reports page slow when loading more than 10,000 records

title: Incorrect currency conversion rates
description: Currency conversion showing outdated exchange rates

title: Mobile menu not closing on click outside
description: Hamburger menu remains open when clicking outside on mobile view

title: Data export feature timing out
description: CSV export fails for datasets larger than 50,000 rows

title: Broken links in documentation
description: Several internal links in API documentation return 404 errors

title: User session timeout too short
description: Users getting logged out after 15 minutes of inactivity

title: Calendar widget showing wrong dates
description: Date picker showing incorrect month navigation in some timezones

title: Missing error validation on forms
description: Contact form not showing validation errors for required fields

title: API documentation outdated
description: Several new endpoints missing from public API documentation

title: Push notifications not working on Android
description: Android users not receiving push notifications for new messages

title: Accessibility issues with screen readers
description: Several ARIA labels missing and focus management issues
